short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lets you play games on twitch streams with the chat

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension lets you play games with twitch chat.
Supported games:
 - Contexto
 - Redactle
 - Linxicon

How to use this extension:
After you install it, click on the extension icon. Click log in and then go to https://ofekn.com/gos

There you can see the available commands, and you will be able to open any of the supported games.
When you are in the game, any message a viewer sends will go directly into the game.

Have fun!
